mapper.insert: insert into GAPARALLEL (PROCESSNO, MACHINENO, MPSNO, PARTNO, PROCTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS) values (#{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{machineno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{partno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proctime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{starttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})
insert into GAParallel select * from GASchedule
mapper.select: select PROCESSNO, MACHINENO, MPSNO, PARTNO, PROCTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS from GAPARALLEL

select GAParallel.MPSNo as "mpsno" ,Process.ProcessNo as "processno" ,Machine.MachineNo as "machineno" ,to_char(sysdate+starttime/24/60/60,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as "starttime" ,to_char(sysdate+endtime/24/60/60,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as "endtime" from GAParallel,Process,Machine where GAParallel.MachineNo=Machine.ID and GAParallel.MPSNo=Process.MPSNo and GAParallel.ProcessNo=Process.SequenceNo and starttime is not null order by GAParallel.MPSNO, cast(GAParallel.processno as integer)
